alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 4:02PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL CAMPBELL AND WEST CENTRAL CROOK COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM MDT... At 402 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Oshoto, or 31 miles northeast of Gillette, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Oshoto and Carlile. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.
